name: Boo!
description:
Game made at Global Game Jam 2019.

Home to us means safety, so what to do if Ghosts are attacking your house? Protect it, of course. Help the child protecting his house against the ghosts.

Made by:

Everton Luiz

Gabriel de Freitas Garcia

Henrique Finger Zimerman

Julia Stateri

Marianna Gois de Campos
